scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:npm-lock
scripts.clean:build: rm -rf ./.parcel-cache && rm -rf ./build && rm -rf ./cdk.out && rm -rf ./packages/**/build && rm -rf ./packages/**/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -f ./tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -rf packages/media-service-api/src/generated/schema*
scripts.ssandbox: AWS_REGION=us-east-1 npx ampx sandbox --profile ihm --dir-to-watch packages/backend
